scripts.rebuildAll: npm run stopAll && npm run buildAndRunAll
scripts.stopApi: docker-compose stop api-gateway && docker-compose rm -f api-gateway
scripts.rebuildApi: npm run stopApi && npm run buildApi
scripts.stopProxy: docker-compose stop proxy-service && docker-compose rm -f proxy-service
scripts.rebuildProxy: npm run stopProxy && npm run buildProxy
scripts.stopMqtt: docker-compose stop mqtt-service && docker-compose rm -f mqtt-service && docker rmi $(docker images -q mqtt-service)
scripts.rebuildMqtt: npm run stopMqtt && npm run buildMqtt
